name: Spinster Walkboy
description:
Hey there! 

This  is my entry to the 'So Bad It's Good' Game Jam of 2018.

I went ahead and made a really good and fun platformer, where you play as my totally original and very funny character, Spinster Walkboy! 

You must take control of his frail body, and defeat the evil monsters to save the world. Along the way you'll make many new friends, have a lot of fun experiences, and maybe even learn a thing or two about yourself.

Twitter (for future updates, or something):
https://twitter.com/RandomPickle97

Thanks for playing!
